EmailTemplate.subject: Did You Know? New Video Edition
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
DID YOU KNOW? New Video Edition!
Have you ever wanted to see in one visual how an institution’s ownership in your company stacks up relative to a peer, or multiple peers?
Did You Know now you can compare ownership activity in multiple securities simultaneously with just a few clicks? Watch this Quick Video to learn more!
For further information or training, please contact your dedicated Account Manager or 24/7 client support at: callmenowIR@ipreo.com or the telephone numbers below:
US: 1-800-305-0819 | Europe: +44 (0) 20 7665 9820 | APAC: +852 58082616
